, it supports [intercepting transitions](https://github.com/4teamwork/ftw.lawgiver/blob/master/README.rst#intercept-and-customize-transitions), which can be used for integrating a staging solution.

trans-unit.target: ，这意味着您可以为启用了SimpleLayout的不同类型设置不同的设置。

. It allows you to add an internal or external link to the block.

Yes it’s simple:
default profile - Installs Simplelayout with default ContentTypes and everything you need to create content the Simplelayout way.
trans-unit.target: 默认配置文件-安装带有默认ContentType的Simplelayout以及以Simplelayout方式创建内容所需的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: lib profile - Just the basics without any ContentTypes. This profile is also available for Plone 5
trans-unit.target: lib配置文件-只是没有任何ContentTypes的基础知识。此配置文件也可用于Plone 5

trans-unit.source: @@simplelayout-view
@sl-synchronize-page-config-with-blocks
Actions
Add Blocks by Drag’n’Drop
Add IE11 fix for InAndOutWidget Javascript. In IE11 it’s not possible to manipulate a select (multiple) after modifying the text of a option. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 添加针对InAndOutWidget Javascript的IE11修复程序。在IE11中，修改选项文本后无法操作选择（多个）。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Add Plone 5.1 compatibility [jone, mbaechtold, mathas.leimgruber]
Add Simlelayout view as possible front page layout + addable types on the plone site. This change provides no upgrade step, since it may break the configuration. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 在plone网站上添加Simlelayout视图作为可能的首页布局+可添加类型。这个变化没有提供升级步骤,因为它可能会破坏配置。[mathias.leimgruber]。

trans-unit.source: Add TextBlock
Add a ‘Remove file’ icon to Dropzone’s file previews (This includes starting to use a previewTemplate for Dropzone). [djowett-ftw]
trans-unit.target: 在Dropzone的文件预览中添加“删除文件”图标（这包括开始为Dropzone使用PreviewTemplate）。[djowett-ftw]

trans-unit.source: Add additional opengraph tags og:description fb:app_id fb:admins [Nachtalb]
trans-unit.target: 添加额外的opengraph标签 og:description fb:app_id fb:admins [Nachtalb]。

trans-unit.source: Add an icon to mark an colorbox image. [tschanzt]
trans-unit.target: 添加一个图标来标记色框图像。[tschanzt]

trans-unit.source: Add anchor to new created blocks. [Kevin Bieri]
trans-unit.target: 为新创建的区块添加锚点。[Kevin Bieri]

trans-unit.source: Add collective.quickupload as dependency for the plone4 extra.
trans-unit.target: 添加collective.quickupload作为plone4 extra的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Add collective.quickupload in plone4. [busykoala]
Add configurable hard and soft image limits for textblocks. [elioschmutz]
trans-unit.target: 为文本块添加可配置的硬图像和软图像限制。[elioschmutz]

trans-unit.source: Add css class to simplelayout container if the user is permitted to edit the content. [Kevin Bieri]
trans-unit.target: 如果允许用户编辑内容,则在simplelayout容器中添加css类。[Kevin Bieri]

trans-unit.source: Add field description for ‘Image alternative text’ and ‘Open image in overlay’. [raphael-s]
trans-unit.target: 添加“图像替代文字”和“在覆盖层中打开图像”的字段说明。[raphael-s]

trans-unit.source: Add ftw.logo support for plone root opengraph integration. [mathias.leimgruber]
Add ftw.simplelayout portal_types translations to plone domain. [tinagerber]
Add ftw.simplelayout.contenttypes profile when mapblock is added by default. [busykoala]
Add ftw.theming:default (upgrade step not provided). [busykoala]
Add image caption field to textblock. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 在文本块中添加图片说明栏。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Add imagecropping with configurable aspect-ratios for textblock-images. [elioschmutz]
Add layouts by Drag’n’Drop
Add macros and slots to block views for easy customization. [jone]
trans-unit.target: 增加宏和槽来屏蔽视图,方便自定义。[jone]

trans-unit.source: Add min-height to SimplelayoutBlock empty columns. [mathias.leimgruber]
Add min-height to empty Simplelyout portlet. This fixes a issue, when it was no longer possible to re-add a layout after deleting the last one. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 为空的Simplelyout portlet添加最小高度。这修复了一个问题,即在删除上一个布局后,无法再重新添加布局。[mathias.leimgruber]。

trans-unit.source: Add missing translation of the AliasBlock for the plone domain [Nachtalb]
Add missing_value attribute to the
Add more sorting options (position in parent, id) to the gallery block. [mbaechtold]
trans-unit.target: 为图库区块添加更多的排序选项(在父区的位置,id)。[mbaechtold]

trans-unit.source: Add new block (AliasBlock) which renders the content of other blocks. The extra “aliasblock” is required to install this block. [busykoala]
trans-unit.target: 添加新的块（AliasBlock），以呈现其他块的内容。要安装此模块，需要额外的“ aliasblock”。[busykoala]

trans-unit.source: Add optional behavior to add a checkbox to show/hide the title of a contentpage. [raphael-s]
trans-unit.target: 增加可选的行为,增加一个复选框来显示/隐藏一个内容页的标题。[raphael-s]

trans-unit.source: Add optional support for
Add optional title to the video block (disabled by default). [mbaechtold]
trans-unit.target: 为视频块添加可选的标题(默认情况下已禁用)。[mbaechtold]

trans-unit.source: Add plone.restapi endpoint for synchronizing blocks with the page config [Nachtalb]
trans-unit.target: 添加plone.restapi端点,用于与页面配置同步块[Nachtalb]。

trans-unit.source: Add sort-options to image gallery block. [raphael-s]
trans-unit.target: 在图片库区添加分类选项。[Raphael-s]

trans-unit.source: Add support for “ftw.gopip”. [jone, mbaechtold]
trans-unit.target: 添加对“ ftw.gopip”的支持。[乔恩·姆巴希托德]

trans-unit.source: Add support for ES6 using babeljs
Add support for www.youtube-nocookie.com video urls. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 增加对www.youtube-nocookie.com 视频URLs的支持。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Add the package to your buildout configuration:
trans-unit.target: Voeg het pakket toe aan uw opbouwconfiguratie:

trans-unit.source: Add tooling for creating a staging solution. [jone]
trans-unit.target: 增加创建分期解决方案的工具。[Jone]

trans-unit.source: Add uninstall profile for ftw.simplelayout.contenttypes. [elioschmutz]
Add uninstall profile for ftw.simplelayout.mapblock. [elioschmutz]
Add viewletmanager for block add/edit form in order to load custom code. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 为块添加/编辑表单添加viewletmanager,以便加载自定义代码。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Add vimeo video iframe wrapper for better styling possibility. [busykoala]
trans-unit.target: 增加vimeo视频iframe包装器,更好的造型可能性。[busykoala]

trans-unit.source: Add zcml:condition=”have ftw.simplelayout:trash” to trash related handlers. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 将zcml：condition =“ have ftw.simplelayout：trash”添加到与垃圾相关的处理程序中。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Additional plone.restapi methods

After creating blocks in a simplelayout content page they should be synchronized with the pages config. Otherwise the order in the frontend might be wrong. It also removes objects which are in the pages config but not in the page itself.
trans-unit.target: 在simplelayout内容页中创建块后,它们应该与页面配置同步。否则前端的顺序可能会出错。它还可以删除页面配置中的对象,但不是页面本身。

trans-unit.source: After editing the content, the view automatically reloads the block.
trans-unit.target: 编辑内容后,视图会自动重新加载区块。

trans-unit.source: Aliasblock only show link to referenced page if you are able to modify the aliasblock. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 只有当你能够修改别名区块时,别名区块才会显示引用页面的链接。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: All Blocks within this package, ftw.addressblock and ftw.sliderblock are supported. Other Blocks from different packages or policies won’t work because the list of aliasable blocks is hardcoded. This list of blocks is available via
trans-unit.target: 支持该软件包中的所有块ftw.addressblock和ftw.sliderblock。来自不同软件包或策略的其他块将不起作用，因为可别名块的列表是硬编码的。可以通过以下途径获得此块列表

trans-unit.source: All Simplelayout sites are configured to have only 1 column Layouts
trans-unit.target: 所有的Simplelayout网站都被配置为只有1列Layouts。

trans-unit.source: Allow a description to be added when files are uploaded via listingblock or galleryblock. [djowett-ftw]
trans-unit.target: 允许在通过listingblock或galleryblock上传文件时添加描述。[djowett-ftw]

trans-unit.source: Although the staging can be integrated in various ways (actions, events, etc.), it is usually integrated in the workflow. Since
trans-unit.target: 虽然分期可以以各种方式(动作、事件等)集成,但通常是集成在工作流中。由于

trans-unit.source: Always load videoblock js, not only when logged in [Nachtalb]
trans-unit.target: 总是加载videoblock js,而不是只在登录时才加载[Nachtalb]。

trans-unit.source: Anchor extraction from Blocks for anchors on a page.
trans-unit.target: Ankerafvoer uit blokken voor ankers op een pagina.

trans-unit.source: Archetypes block integration (for legacy packages).
trans-unit.target: 原型块集成(针对传统包)。

trans-unit.source: As you can see, you never have to leave the ContentPage, all actions with Simplelayout are asynchronous. This means adding, deleting and editing always opens an overlay, where you can make the modifications.
trans-unit.target: Zoals u ziet hoeft u de ContentPage nooit te verlaten,alle acties met Simplelayout zijn asynchroon.Dit betekent dat het toevoegen,verwijderen en bewerken altijd een overlay opent,waar u de wijzigingen kunt aanbrengen.

trans-unit.source: Attach events using the singleton instance of eventEmitter.
trans-unit.target: 使用eventEmitter的单人实例附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Basically that’s it :-) You just created a new block!!
trans-unit.target: 基本上就是这样：-)您刚刚创建了一个新块！

trans-unit.source: Behaviors
Block Views: Check for extisting viewname before setting the view_name value. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 块视图。在设置view_name值之前,先检查是否有现存的viewname。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Blocks
BugFix for IE11 VideoBlock: Prevent iframe from stopping event bubbling in IE [Kevin Bieri]
trans-unit.target: IE11 VideoBlock的BugFix。防止iframe在IE中停止事件冒泡 [Kevin Bieri]。

trans-unit.source: BugFix: Copyied event is called recursively. Check if the block is actually part of the current page. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: BugFix:Copyied事件被递归调用。检查该块是否真的是当前页面的一部分。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Building
By default the
By default we have golden ratio-, 1-2-1-, 3-1, 1-1-2-layouts
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,我们有黄金比例、1-2-1、3-1、1-1-2-布局。

trans-unit.source: By default you can choose between a 1 column, 2 Column or 4 Column layout. Simplelayout adds an empty 1 column layout for you by default, so you can directly start adding a Block.
trans-unit.target: Standaard kunt u kiezen tussen een 1-kolom,2-kolom of 4-kolom indeling.Simplelayout voegt standaard een lege 1 kolom layout voor u toe,zodat u direct kunt beginnen met het toevoegen van een Block.

trans-unit.source: Change event binding on tab from onClick to just click in order to trigger the function on plone 5 too. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 将tab上的事件绑定从onClick改为just click,以便在plone 5上也能触发该功能。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Change primary field of text block from “image” to “text” field in order to support anchors. [jone]
trans-unit.target: 将文本块的主字段从“图像”更改为“文本”字段，以支持锚点。[乔恩]

trans-unit.source: Change representation of blocks directly on the Block itself
trans-unit.target: 直接在区块本身上改变区块的表现形式

trans-unit.source: Disable kss spinner. [Kevin Bieri]
Display default youtube player controls [Kevin Bieri]

trans-unit.source: Display mapblock in 2/3 ratio. [mathias.leimgruber]
Do not allow to reference the ContentPage you are creating the AliasBlock on to prevent recursion [Nachtalb]
trans-unit.target: 不允许引用您正在创建AliasBlock的ContentPage,以防止递归[Nachtalb]。

trans-unit.source: Do not show empty block warning on textblock if there is only a title. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 如果只有一个标题,不要在文本块上显示空块警告。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Do not show spinner when loading toolbox. [jone]
Do render the simplelayout portlet on non-simplelayout content types. [mbaechtold]
trans-unit.target: 在非implelayout内容类型上渲染simplelayout portlet。[mbaechtold]

trans-unit.source: Don’t allow all non-folderish types to be selectable as default page. Without this types like the TextBlock can be selected and would break the site. [lknoepfel]
trans-unit.target: 不允许将所有非文件夹类型都选择为默认页面。没有这种类型，可以选择类似TextBlock的类型，这将破坏站点。[lknoepfel]

trans-unit.source: Drop
Drop support for standard plone theme (sunburst) [Kevin Bieri]
trans-unit.target: 丢掉对标准plone主题的支持(sunburst)[Kevin Bieri]。

trans-unit.source: Each DOM element provides the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 每个DOM元素提供了以下属性。

trans-unit.source: Each block and layout is represented in the DOM through an ID.
trans-unit.target: 每一个块和布局在DOM中通过一个ID来表示。

Features dropped for Plone 5.1.x:
First steps

trans-unit.source: Hansle start/t querysting for youtube videos. [mathias.leimgruber]
Hide main scrollbar when overlay is opened. [jone]
trans-unit.target: 当打开覆盖层时,隐藏主滚动条。[jone]

trans-unit.source: Hide toolbox on small devices. [Kevin Bieri]
trans-unit.target: 在小型设备上隐藏工具箱。[Kevin Bieri]

trans-unit.source: Highlight active layout. [Kevin Bieri]
IStaging
Image

Implement a inner_edit.json view, which allows us to edit an item in a folderish block. For example edit a file directly in a FilelistingBlock. This view works almost like the block edit view, the difference is, that the inner_edit.json view returns the rendered html of its parent (the Block). [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 实现一个inner_edit.json视图,它允许我们编辑一个文件夹块中的项目。例如直接编辑FilelistingBlock中的一个文件。这个视图的工作原理和块编辑视图差不多,不同的是,inner_edit.json视图返回的是它的父块(块)的渲染html。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Implement a really hackish way to support IE11. Native c.geo implementation always implements the map api twice and has caching issues. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 实现一个非常黑的方式来支持IE11。原生的c.geo实现总是两次实现map api,而且有缓存问题。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Implement a simplelayout renderer object. This allows us to render simplelayoutish structures without the simplelayout provider expression. Further it’s now possible to render only one layout of slot. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 实现一个simplelayout渲染器对象。这使我们可以在没有simplelayout提供程序表达式的情况下呈现simplelayoutish结构。此外，现在可以仅渲染插槽的一种布局。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Implement better image alt text for galleryblock and textblock. Improves Accessibility. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 为图库块和文本块实现更好的图片alt文字。提高了可访问性。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Implement inplace migrators for migration from ftw.contentpage. [jone]
Implement more specific MapLayers factory to prevent adding the same layers multiple times. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 实现更具体的MapLayers工厂,防止多次添加相同的图层。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Implement new block coordinate behavior, which uses it’s own widget for JS compatibility (it handles the google map api integration). [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 实现新的块坐标行为，该行为将其自身的小部件用于JS兼容性（它处理google map api集成）。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Implement persisten map layer and zoom value. Both can be chosen in the edit widget and will be reused on the display widget. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 实现地图层和缩放值的持久化。两者都可以在编辑部件中选择,并将在显示部件中重用。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: Implement request tracker. [Kevin Bieri]
Implement statekeeter to track DOM changes. [Kevin Bieri]
Implement unrestricted_uuidToObject to get the infos for the staging viewlet, regardless of the workflow. [mathias.leimgruber]
trans-unit.target: 实现unrestricted_uuidToObject来获取staging viewlet的信息,不管工作流如何。[mathias.leimgruber]

trans-unit.source: It’s also possible to select a whole ContentPage to render within the AliasBlock. It’s not possible however to select a ContentPage which already contains an AliasBlock or the ContentPage an AliasBlock is being created on to prevent recursion.
trans-unit.target: 也可以选择整个ContentPage呈现在AliasBlock中。但是，不可能选择已经包含AliasBlock的ContentPage或正在创建AliasBlock的ContentPage来防止递归。

trans-unit.source: Just drag the Block of your choice, for example a TextBlock, into the layout. Enter title, body text and/or an image. Then click save.
trans-unit.target: Sleep het blok van uw keuze,bijvoorbeeld een TextBlock,naar de lay-out.Voer de titel,de tekst en/of een afbeelding in.Klik vervolgens op opslaan.

trans-unit.source: Simple usage example:

SimpleLayout provides an intuitive way of adding and arranging the different elements of a page such as paragraphs, images, files and links using drag-and-drop functionality. These elements are implemented as addable and easily arrangeable “blocks”. Because of the restricted dimensions of text, images and other content elements, the general result is content with a uniform look and feel throughout the site.
trans-unit.target: SimpleLayout提供使用拖放功能添加和排列页面的不同元素（如段落，图像，文件和链接）的直观方法。这些元素被实现为可添加且易于安排的“块”。由于文本，图像和其他内容元素的尺寸受到限制，因此总体结果是在整个站点上具有统一外观的内容。

trans-unit.source: SimpleLayout provides block based content pages
trans-unit.target: SimpleLayout提供基于块的内容页面

trans-unit.source: Simplelayout
Simplelayout Portlet
Simplelayout provides integration level tools for setting up a staging solution for content pages. An
trans-unit.target: Simplelayout提供了集成级的工具,用于设置内容页面的分期解决方案。一个

trans-unit.target: Vereenvoudigde schepen met standaard twee inhoudstypes.Een mapachtig type,de

trans-unit.source: Simplelayout your site
SimplelayoutBlockBehavior

Simplelayouts provides a basic OpenGraph integration. You can disable (Simplelayout Settings - Control Panel) Opengraph for the plone root as you wish, because it’s enabled by default. On Simplelayout sites itself the OpenGraph meta tags can be controlled by the
trans-unit.target: Simplelayouts提供了基本的OpenGraph集成。您可以根据需要禁用（简单布局设置-控制面板）Opengraph根根Opengraph，因为它是默认启用的。在Simplelayout网站本身上，OpenGraph元标记可以由

trans-unit.source: Simply add a new ContentPage instead of a Plone Document. A Toolbox appears on the right, which allows you to create content on/in your ContentPage with Simplelayout.
trans-unit.target: Voeg gewoon een nieuwe ContentPage toe in plaats van een Plone Document.Aan de rechterkant verschijnt een Toolbox,waarmee u met Simplelayout content op/in uw ContentPage kunt aanmaken.

trans-unit.source: Some Blocks need to run some JS code after rendering or for the widget itself while adding/editing. For this use case you can simply listen to the jquerytools overlay events.
trans-unit.target: 有些Blocks需要在渲染后运行一些JS代码,或者在添加/编辑时为widget本身运行一些JS代码。对于这种情况,你可以简单地监听jquerytools覆盖事件。

trans-unit.source: Some blocks can be hidden now. Users allowed to edit the block will see the block anyway. [mbaechtold]
trans-unit.target: 现在可以隐藏一些区块。允许编辑该区块的用户无论如何都会看到该区块。[mbaechtold]

trans-unit.source: Using the View itself, by overwrite the
When the working copy is applied back, the content of its children are copied back to the baseline. The simplelayout state and relations are updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 当工作副本被应用回时,其子代的内容被复制回基线。简单布局状态和关系也会相应更新。

trans-unit.source: When the working copy is created, only simplelayout block children are copied from the baseline to the working copy. This has the advantage that a root page of a large structure can be revised and copied without a performance problem because of many subpages.
trans-unit.target: 当创建工作副本时,只有简单布局块的子块会从基线复制到工作副本中。这样做的好处是,一个大型结构的根页面可以修改和复制,而不会因为有很多子页面而出现性能问题。

trans-unit.source: Will be provided as data attribute
